body.name: Feit Electric Doorbell Camera, Wireless Video Doorbell, 2.4 GHz WiFi, No Hub, Two-Way Audio, Motion Detection, Night Vision, 1080p HD, Micro SD Card Storage, Hardwired or Battery, CAM/Door/WiFi/BATG2
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 19 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 19 mins
features: ✅ HARDWIRED or BATTERY POWERED – See everything 24-7 and control your security camera using the App anywhere. Whether hardwired or installed wirelessly, the rechargeable 6700mAh battery keeps the camera running even during electricity outages.

✅ 1080p HD VIDEO – Record faces and read license plates even if your WI-FI is down. This Smart Camera records with motion or continuously and comes with 128 GB Micro SD Card storage (SD card not included) meaning no subscription fee is required.

✅ NIGHT VISION UP TO 30FT – This doorbell video camera has 30ft night vision with a range of and 140 degrees. Receive push notifications when activity is detected up, capture playback and share video and pictures all from your mobile device.
✅ TWO-WAY AUDIO - This door bell camera has two-way audio allowing you to see, hear and speak with visitors from anywhere as long as you have a mobile device. Keep intruders at bay.
✅ EFFICIENT & TRUSTED – Feit Electric completes quality testing to ensure the camera doorbell is easy to install, passes safety standards, is wet location rated and will last through the seasons.
body.description: Stay updated with deliveries, visitors, and other motion detection alerts from anywhere in the world with the Feit Electric Smart Video Doorbell Camera. This smart doorbell camera combines wired and battery power, for a versatile choice suitable for both houses and apartments. Get alerts straight to your phone or smart assistant whenever the doorbell rings or motion is detected. Turn motion detection notifications ON/OFF manually, set timers, or use the Geofencing feature to turn them ON/OFF when you arrive or leave home. Reduce false motion triggers from pets or cars by setting the doorbell camera to detect only humans. Communicate in real-time live feeds with the built-in two-way microphone and speaker using the Feit Electric app, or with a video-enabled smart assistant like the Amazon Echo or Google Nest devices. Unlike cloud-controlled smart devices that charge monthly fees to store your saved content, this Smart Doorbell Camera records and stores HD video and photos directly to the device using a Micro SD card (sold separately). For installation convenience, hardwire into the existing electrical or run solely on battery power. The CAM/DOOR/WIFI/BATG2 Doorbell Camera uses a rechargeable 6700 mAh battery, for peace of mind even if the power goes out. Wire to an existing doorbell or connect wirelessly to the compatible Feit Electric CHIME/DOOR/SMART Wireless Door Chime. Choose a dependable smart video doorbell with no monthly fees and hassle-free installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always use feit electric products because the work well and are suscription free. I bought this doorbell because it is rechargable and can also be install in a doorbell conection so you have the best of both worlds. I also comes with the charger and all the tools you need the only thing it dosen't come with is the sd card. It also comes with the manual in english and another language. You can use it with alexa and google but it has to be an echo or nest to be able to see on the screen who is outside you can also see in the app of feit electronics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality picture and work well
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded my original Feit door bell camera to this one. Glad I did. Picture quality, sleek, modern design, longer battery life. The only con is unless you have your phone with you, you do not hear when someone rings / presses the button

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This vendor took 10 days to begin the shipping process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Android 14
reviews.reviewText: Using a Google Pixel with Android 14. The app asks for storage permission, and when I go to Apps/Feit Electric/Permissions there is no "storage" permission per se. There are other permissions, and they are all granted yet the app still asks for storage permission and will not run without it. The app frequently locks up and the user interface design is mediocre at best. I've heard the IOS version works a lot better. The Android app is an afterthought at best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to subscription based products
reviews.reviewText: works right out of the box. easy install, quick setup. 3 weeks in, still has 84% battery. and subscription free.one small thing if you have other products by this brand, you either has notifications from all of the cameras, or none of them, I have not figured out a way to limit which camera to received notifications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was good but had issues with connecting the camera to bracket. It was pretty loose and the included glue stickers didn't work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Add a doorbell camera to system easy installation works very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I really wanted to like this
reviews.reviewText: I have several Feit LED smart bulbs and love them, so I was thrilled to discover Feit made a video doorbell. Unfortunately, it does not perform as well as I had hoped. Motion sensitivity was inconsistent at best and without smart zones I was plagued with false alarms. The doorbell would alert for a car driving by but not for a person walking up to deliver a package. Adjustments of sensitivity were either picking up everything (including snowflakes) or virtually nothing (including a chubby guy waving his arms 6’ away). Sorry Feit, I really wanted to like this.
